title: Display keeps on dimming
body:
I just bough my new computer and when ever I play league the screen dims and then brightens again. It happenes every few mins or so. How can I solve this? Also, sometimes my screen will lag out a bit and my character will suddenly move to another spot (Kinda like a frame cut). So can someone help me out? That would be great thanks!

HollyWood41

replies.body:
Hmm.. I'd first ensure you've configured Windows to run with [**maximum performance**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq6). If everything from that end looks good, make sure there aren't any programs running in the background that control your display's brightness or adjust it on the fly. You can [**perform a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure all background apps are eliminated.

Let me know what changed.

Hi and thank you for helping me, I performed a clean boot but in the max performance, it says in the first step to right click computer, I am using windows 10 and I don't really know how to right click computer. Can you help me with that?

I also just played a game, (Legend of the Poro King) and the screen kept doing the screen cut things and this time the mouse even started to glitch and become unresponsive. (The battery is fully charged). So right now I don't really know what to do.

Hollywood41

Ah, sorry about that. I found a guide that goes over changing power plan settings in Windows 10, which you can find [**here.**](https://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/2843-power-plan-settings-change-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if anything changes as a result of the steps you've taken.
Ok thank you very much for that! That really helped. So far the screen has not dimmed (It's on max performance). So thank you very much!
